name: rpc.do
description: RPC.do SDK - Promise pipelining RPC for .do services

scripts.check:publish: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const deps = JSON.stringify(pkg.dependencies || {}); if (deps.includes('workspace:')) { console.error('ERROR: workspace: protocol found in dependencies. Replace with actual versions before publishing.'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm check:publish && pnpm build && pnpm test

author: DotDo
